nodes.text: The Vanquisher double-bladed lightsaber hilt was occasionally used by the students of Luke Skywalker's New Jedi Order, although it resembled the weapons of Exar Kun and Darth Maul. Unlike the Guardian, Champion, and Vindicator hilts, Vanquisher was forged as a single unit, with the main body thicker than the ends in order to give the wielder more stability.
